Depop | Platform, Scala, Python, iOS, Android, QA | London, Manchester UK | ONSITE, REMOTE, FULL-TIME | https://www.depop.com/about/jobs

Welcome to Depop. We are the social marketplace where over 10M people come to buy, sell and discover unique items. Our mission is to make our platform the place for the most vibrant communities in the world.

With offices in London and Manchester, and spaces in LA and New York, we have a team of more than 100 people dedicated to enhancing and developing the Depop experience for our global communities. And we’re just getting started.

We’re currently helping build one of the most dynamic and well-funded start-ups in the London tech scene. Sound like your thing?
